I will provide a clean and readable output, while explaining each step of the formatting process. Please note that some of the data is in French, which will be translated to English for clarity. **Initial Data:** The data is presented as a JSON object with multiple key-value pairs. We will break it down into smaller, more manageable sections for easier understanding. **Formatting Steps: 1.** Identify the main categories of data: We have various sections, such as `title-titre-eng`, `referenceNumber-numeroReference`, `tenderStatus-appelOffresStatut-eng`, etc. These will be our main categories. **2.** Separate language-dependent data: Some fields, like `title-titre-eng` and `title-titre-fra`, contain English and French text, respectively. We'll keep them together for now, but translate the French text for clarity. **3.** Extract relevant information: We'll focus on extracting key details from the original data, such as `contract_id`, `type`, `department`, `procurement_category`, and more. **4.** Format the data: We'll organize the extracted information into a JSON object, with clear labels and concise descriptions. **Output:** Here is the formatted data in JSON format: ```json {
full_summary:
**Notice of Amendment : Tender Dated 2022-10-27**

## Public Works and Government Services Canada Seeks Professional Audit Support Services (PASS)

### Tender Overview

The Government of Canada, through Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), intends to establish a contract for Professional Audit Support Services (PASS) under the Supply Arrangement (SA) for Stream 3: Information Technology and Systems Audits.

### Contract Details

* **Contract Period**: One year, with two one-year irrevocable options to extend the contract term.
* **Scope of Work**:
	+ Internal and external audits
	+ IT systems audits
* **Location**: National Capital Region
* **Eligibility**: Only PASS SA holders currently holding a PASS SA for Stream 3: Information Technology and Systems Audits are eligible to compete.

### Accessible Procurement

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) ensures that the goods and services purchased by the Government of Canada are inclusive by design and accessible by default. Accessibility criteria must be included in the requirements for goods and services, where appropriate.

### Submission Requirements

* All questions related to this solicitation must be sent via email to Michelle Fradette at [michelle.fradette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:michelle.fradette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* The solicitation document is available in PDF format only.

### Contracting Entity Information

* Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)
* 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, Canada K1A 0S5

### Notice of Expiration

This tender has expired. Only PASS SA holders who have submitted a bid prior to the tender closing date of 2022-11-17T14:00:00 are eligible to participate.

### Enquiries

All questions related to this solicitation must be sent via email to Michelle Fradette at [michelle.fradette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:michelle.fradette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) by the tender closing date. [michelle.fradette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:michelle.fradette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Note**: This notice is for information purposes only and is not intended to be a summary of the procurement conditions. Applicants must study the original
